price: 7. O jūs, kurie tikite! Jeigu remsite Allaho (tikslą), Jis parems jus, ir padarys jūsų žingsnius tvirtais.
arabic: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوٓاْ إِن تَنصُرُواْ ٱللَّهَ يَنصُرۡكُمۡ وَيُثَبِّتۡ أَقۡدَامَكُمۡ

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: yāayyuhā alladhīna āmanū in tanṣurū al-laha yanṣur'kum wayuthabbit aqdāmakum
